channel.title: Entity_systems on Seeds from the Apple of Discord
channel.description: Recent content in Entity_systems on Seeds from the Apple of Discord

item.title: Dependency Injection Considered ~~Harmful~~ Stupid - Part 2
item.description: After messing around with dependency injection frameworks in the first part, let’s see how we can take our LotR example and unclutter it by using data-oriented functional programming in Elixir!

item.title: Introducing 'to entice so.'
item.description: Despite the misleading title of this - it could as well be a social engineering guide - I’m going to introduce a free, libre and open-source software project that I’m in charge of.
